None.Name: Storm Cloud
None.Description: Creates a thunderstorm that tosses 4 bolts of lightning at enemy units within a 20m radius. Every bolt may jump to several targets dealing 180 damage to the first one while the following targets will receive continously less damage. Lasts for 20 seconds. Reusable every 20 seconds.

Extra.en: Thunderstorm will jump to nearby targets (10m range),  dealing 20% less damage than the original 180 damage it does per jump. The first jump deals 20% less damage (144),  the second deals 40% less damage (108),  and the third deals 60% less damage (72). Can jump a maximum of 3 times.
Extra.de: Thunderstorm will jump to nearby targets (10m range),  dealing 20% less damage than the original 180 damage it does per jump. The first jump deals 20% less damage (144),  the second deals 40% less damage (108),  and the third deals 60% less damage (72). Can jump a maximum of 3 times.
